Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Hey, why is my ad still under review?

Hey Jason, the ad approval process usually takes between 1-2 business days. Sometimes it can be quicker, but it depends on the volume of ads being reviewed. If it's been longer than that, you might want to check if there are any issues with your ad setup. You can find more details here: [How to create your first ad](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17618196971149-How-to-create-your-first-ad).
Everything seems to be setup correctly. I created the ad last Tuesday?

Thanks for the update, Jason. Since it's been more than 1-2 business days, there might be an issue with the verification of your account or domain. Please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners.
